venue.name: Jake n JOES Sports Bar and Grille

item.description:
Hey ladies,

 

My most sincere apologies for the 3 month delay in scheduling and event.  Things are back on track and I will make sure we do at least one event a month moving forward!

 

I hope everyone is having a wonderful summer and enjoying this weather?

 

Jake and JOES has a large indoor bar and some outdoor seating.  I figured as the date nears and we get an idea of how many plan to show and what the weather will be like, we can decide if we want to be in or outdoors.

 

I chose a Thursday night this time so we could actually get a table and avoid the Friday bar madness.

 

Looking forward to seeing everyone!

 

Lisa
item.how_to_find_us: I will suggest a meeting place as the date nears
item.name: Let's head to Jake and JOES for some apps and cocktails
